home.description: I am a young developer with two years of real programming experience. Passionate about manga, video games, sports, and development in Java and TypeScript, I enjoy tackling technical challenges and continuously improving my skills. Motivated and rigorous, I am always ready to learn new technologies and collaborate effectively in teams to successfully carry out innovative projects. My goal is to design high-performance and optimized solutions while contributing to a dynamic and stimulating work environment.
